SilverStar/baby Dragon


Silver star looked at her father with a look that =
seemed shame, her little brother moved close with caution and glently licke=
d her sister conforting her. The girl started to bite playfully at her brot=
her.

Talon looked at her children and said "Sirius, I like astronomy too a=
nd I liked to give my children stars names"
